lines.text: Attention, passengers, we are now leaving Nun Central and are beginning our journey to Hell and beyond. The captain has turned off the "no smoking" sign, and you may now move about the cabin freely.
[Kids start screaming, reading Playboy, and gambling]
Thank you for being Catholic, and for choosing the Saint Gabriel's School Bus.
Just where do you think you are?
The Library of Congress?
Detroit?
Beyond the sun?
It's time for spice, and the lucky spice is... paprika! "Oh thank you, thank you! You've made me the happiest spice in the world!"
The car has low mileage and handles like a dream.
Well, so does Debbie.
I wish I had someone I could really respect. Hey, look at the cans on that bimbo!
Pretty heavy, hey dude?

Rick, I want Debbie. You dump her and I'll give you cash. Ten thousand dollars, plus a G.E. toaster over; a Litton microwave; a Cuisinart; Michelin tires, brand new; a set of Sears' best metric tools...
Let's have a bachelor party with chicks and guns and fire trucks and hookers and drugs and booze!
Yeah! Yeah yeah! All the things that make life worth living for!
Rick, let's cut through the B.S.
I'd like that.
I think you're an asshole.
What did you say, Stanley? What did you say, Stanley? What did you say, Stanley? You said no hookers! You said no hookers! No hookers! No hookers! No hookers! No hookers!
Are you the pimp?
Yes.
You look like Gandhi!
I've got girls to sit on your face.
Well Mr. Thompson, that's quite a list. And I think, if I really apply myself, I could be a totally changed person by the time we finish lunch!
Guys, GUYS GUYS!
For the last time I'm telling you to get off! OFF!
GUYS!
Holy shit!
Diagnoses?
Medically speaking?
Yes.
Whacked out of his brains on drugs.
By the way, my name is Tim and I'm always available. I also do engine work on BMW's.
I just bet my balls and shook on it.
I hope you like potato salad... it's chunky style... my favorite!
And remember, bitches back in 45 minutes, or Milt cuts your balls off!
Milt, who's Milt?
[a giant thug smashes a window with his head]
I'm looking for this dung-head who took my women! He is being liar to me! I want my bitches back!
[Crossbow dart flies across the room and strikes the wall next to Rajah]
Holy shit! I'm going to get Milt. Right now. I'm going to get the fuck out of here.

[the guys find out their porno film has been edited]
Not that I'm complaining, but I usually don't like my filth this clean!
Whatta waste of two women!
I don't get it; the dirty parts were there yesterday!
I had a wiener right in my hand.
A strange wang right in my palm.
Rick, you promise you won't fool around at your bachelor party?
I swear on my mother's grave.
Your mother's still alive.
Well if I go back on my word, I'll kill her.
Who was that?
I dunno.

[pointing to the arrow]
And what's this?
Search me.

[Another arrow hits the wall]
What about this?
Still drawing a blank.

[Seeing Cole across the way]
He look familiar to you?
Yep.
Get the hookers in a circle. We're going to put Cochise out of business.
Are there gonna be girls at the party?
No... it's a 'stag' party, and that means that the 'does' stay home!
I'm not talking about the 'does'. I'm talking about hookers.
Ooohh... those!
[on Mr. Nicholas' "size"]
Personally, I was impressed when they opened the World Trade Center, but this, this is a piece of work.
Hi, come on in! Drugs to the right, hookers to the left.
What the hell are you doing?
I'm slashing my wrist.
With an electric razor?
Yeah, I couldn't find any razor blades.
Well at least your wrist will be smooth and kissable.

[tied up and gagged]
MMF MFF MFFFFF MFFF!
He says he's having a wonderful time and he's thinking of changing his name to Spike.
[greeting everybody at table]
Mr. Thompson... Mrs. Thompson... Debbie... and...
Bond. James Bond.
Gentlemen... start your boners.

[toasting]
To girls with big tits!

[after being arrested and handcuffed to THE she/male he slept with earlier]
NO, NOT HER, SHE PEES STANDING UP, NOT HER!

[after Stan has left the syringe for taking blood sticking out of his arm]
Um, Stan? Is this supposed to be like this?
Uh... no, that's incorrect.
[carefully removes syringe]

[tasting some of his own dinner]
This is the food prison riots are made out of.

[after dunking his head into an empty bathtub]
Pain... is such a rush!
Is that the foot-long?
And then some.
